title: Hero Survivors
description: Hero Survivors is an action-roguelike game where you'll face countless waves of menacing spirits in intense battles reminiscent of Vampire Survivors. Choose from three distinct heroes, each with their unique traits, and embark on a journey filled with thrilling adventures and epic challenges. Will you emerge victorious against the spirits, or will you fall in battle like so many before you? The fate of the world hangs in the balanceâ€”choose wisely, hero!
